0111001001000011 1010111110100111 1 -> sum: 0010000111101011, cout: 1
1110110100000101 0110100011001111 1 -> sum: 0101010111010101, cout: 1
0110111101001101 1111100001011101 0 -> sum: 0110011110101010, cout: 1
0011011010111100 1101000111111111 0 -> sum: 0000100010111011, cout: 1
0110011010001001 0000000110101010 1 -> sum: 0110100000110100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
